scripts.install:dev: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.install:prod: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm install --production --no-package-lock
scripts.prepare:zip: npm run install:dev && npm run build && npm run install:prod
scripts.make:zip: npm run prepare:zip && rm -f unimarket-chat-service.zip && zip -r unimarket-chat-service.zip dist node_modules package.json
scripts.deploy:lambda: npm run make:zip && npm run update:lambda
scripts.serverless:offline: rm -rf dist && npm run build && npx serverless offline
